item.title: Endpoint validation
item.description: Hi, In my previous job, I spent hours debugging internal data transformations to figure out the received data from an external API was faulty. This issue would not appeared with schema validation. My fault was that I trusted the incoming data and didnâ€™t check for data consistency. Learning from mistakes and saving time, I would set up a small example for JSON validation via Pydantic. FastAPI relies heavily on pydantic and I use it for validating the incoming request and outgoing response.
